revisionDesc.change: Submit - corrected lunate sigma in fr8lin2.
Commit - corrected lunate sigma in fr8lin2.
Submit - Text edited from reference edition, updated metadata.

div.p: This papyrus has been digitally edited in the webinar Digital Editions of Greek Literary and Paraliterary Papyri taught by Rodney Ast and Holger Essler.
